Cesarean Sections as a 
Proportion of All Births
Cesarean sections (C-sections) can prevent 
both maternal and perinatal deaths, as well 
as severe maternal health complications such 
as obstetric fistula. The population-based 
C-section rate (number of C-sections performed 
as a proportion of all births) is an indicator 
of access to life-saving obste
